fragments.content:
SELECT *
FROM S
	INNER JOIN C ON S.SNO = C.SNO
WHERE SNAME = 'QWE';

SELECT *
FROM S
	INNER JOIN C ON S.SNO = C.SNO
	INNER JOIN SC ON SC.CNO = C.CNO
WHERE SNAME = 'QWE';
fragments.title: 标签页
标签页
fragments.content:
CREATE VIEW V_C
AS
SELECT S.SNO, SNAME, GRADE
FROM S INNER JOIN SC
ON S.SNO = SC.SNO
WHERE CNO = (
    SELECT CNO
    FROM C
    WHERE CNAME = '高等数学'
    )
WITH CHECK OPTION;

SELECT *
FROM V_C;

fragments.content:
CREATE TRIGGER TR_NT
ON TABLE_NAME
FOR/AFTER//INSTEAD OF UPDATE,INSERT,DELETE
AS
BEGIN
    IF EXISTS (
        SELECT *
        FROM S
        WHERE SNAME = '123'
    )
    BEGIN
    	PRINT 'test';
        ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;
    END
END;

SQL Server 常见聚集函数包括：
	•	COUNT：计数
	•	SUM：求和
	•	AVG：平均值
	•	MIN / MAX：最小值 / 最大值
	•	STDEV / VAR：标准偏差 / 方差
	•	STRING_AGG：字符串聚合。
fragments.title: 标签页

fragments.content:
CREATE TABLE SampleTable (
    ID INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY, --主键
    Name NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    Age INT CHECK (Age >= 0 AND Age <= 150), --带约束的证书
    Salary DECIMAL(18, 2) DEFAULT 0.00, --精确小数
    CreatedAt DATETIME DEFAULT GETDATE(), --自动填充当前时间
    UpdatedAt DATETIME NULL, --记录更新时间
    IsActive BIT DEFAULT 1, --默认值为 1
    DepartmentID INT NOT NULL, --外键
    Email NVARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, --唯一约束，邮箱值不可重复
);

ALTER TABLE SampleTable --编辑表
ADD CONSTRAINT FK_SampleTable_Department FOREIGN KEY (DepartmentID) --设置外键 DepartmentID
REFERENCES Departments(ID); --引用 Departments 表
